page.title: 17MY HOBBIES
page.content: My favourite hobby is riding & there's a small riding school down my road. I go & help there nearly every day. Just on the outskirts of our village is Highfields Holiday Camp with a swimming pool.They let us go in to swim but you need a pass with a photo on it. We have a Youth Club once a week, a disco & a Games evening every other Friday. In my spare time I go cycling down the roads around Little Clacton with my friends or go out along the footpaths across the fields. I don't have far to walk to get to school either. With all the summer traffic, I think it will be a good job when the bypass comes because our ponies won't be so bothered or frightened by the noise. It will be quieter too for the elderly & safer for the children.
